gameplay_modes.Single Player: Classic enhanced Tetris with all modern features
gameplay_modes.2-Player Battle: WiFi networked competitive battles with garbage attacks
gameplay_modes.Mixed Skill: Different players can play at different speeds

battle_setup: 1. Flash firmware to both M5StickC Plus2 devices
2. Power on first device - press Left+Right to HOST battle
3. Power on second device - press UP to SCAN and connect
4. Both players select their skill level (0-19)
6. Both players ready up and battle begins!
7. Clear lines to send garbage attacks to opponent
8. First to top out loses - winner celebrates!

enhanced_features.HOLD_system: Store current piece for later use (BtnA)
enhanced_features.NEXT_preview: See upcoming piece in top-right corner
enhanced_features.ghost_pieces: Transparent preview of piece drop location
enhanced_features.garbage_attacks: Clear lines to send junk rows to opponent
enhanced_features.level_progression: Exponential speed curve for fair skill matching
enhanced_features.smart_borders: Clean blue boundaries with corner gaps for UI elements

technical_details.synchronization: Countdown system ensures fair simultaneous start
technical_details.garbage_algorithm: Line clears generate attack rows with random gaps
technical_details.lock_delay: SRS-style lock delay with movement reset system
technical_details.rendering: Optimized field drawing with ghost piece overlay
